sentences.sContent: Bud turned the truck around, and started back for Dalton Pond.
sentences.sCn: 巴德把卡车调了个头，开始返回道尔顿池塘。

sentences.sContent: He had reached over to turn around a bottle of champagne so that the label didn't show.
sentences.sCn: 他伸过手把一瓶香槟酒转过去，使它的标签显露不出来。

trans.tranOther: If you turn something around, or if it turns around, it is moved so that it faces the opposite direction
